name: Allah
description: Allah (الله) is the name in the Quran used for the one and only true God, in accordance with the monotheistic nature of Islam.

name: Day of Resurrection
description: Day of Resurrection (يوم القيامة) is the time in the afterlife when Allah will resurrect and judge humanity.

name: Heart
description: Heart (قلب) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Last Day
description: Last Day (اليوم الآخر) is a name mentioned in the Quran that refers to the Day of resurrection.

name: Earth
description: Earth (أرض) is mentioned in many verses of the Quran as the dwelling of Humanity in the worldly life.

name: Satan
description: Satan (الشيطان) is the devil in Islamic theology, and is a Jinn also known as Iblis.

name: Thunder
description: Thunder (رعد) is one type of Weather phenomena mentioned in the Quran.

name: Lightning
description: Lightning (برق) is one type of Weather phenomena mentioned in the Quran.

name: Finger
description: Finger (أصابع) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Ear
description: Ear (أذن) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Rain
description: Rain (مطر) is one type of Weather phenomena mentioned in the Quran.

name: Mosquito
description: Mosquito (بعوضة) is one of the Insects mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Adam
description: Adam (آدم) is the first man created by God, the first prophet in Islam and father of Cain and Abel.

name: Iblis
description: Iblis (إبليس) is another name for Satan (the devil) who was the Jinn that refused to prostrate before Adam.

name: Paradise
description: Paradise (الجنة) is the place of reward and peace in the afterlife.

name: Tree
description: Tree (شجرة) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Children of Israel
description: Children of Israel (بنى إسرائيل) are mentioned in the Quran when referring to the Israelites. According to Islamic belief, the twelve tribes of Israel are the descendents of Yaqub (Jacob, also known as Israel), who was the son of Isaac.

name: Israel
description: Israel (إسرائيل) is the name of the noble prophet Yaqub (Jacob) that is used when referring to the Israelites, known as the Children of israel in the Quran.

name: Pharaoh
description: Pharaoh (فرعون) is the name of the ruler of Ancient egypt at the time of the story of Musa in the Quran.

name: Musa
description: Musa (موسى) is a noble prophet in Islam, who's name occurs more frequently in the Quran than any other prophet or messenger.

name: Golden Calf
description: Golden Calf (عجل الذهب) is mentioned in the Quran, and refers to the false Idol worshipped by the Israelites during Moses' absence.

name: Cloud
description: Cloud (سحاب) is one type of Weather phenomena mentioned in the Quran.

name: Quail
description: Quail (سلوى) is one of the types of Bird mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Herb
description: Herb (بقل) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Cucumber
description: Cucumber (قثاء) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Garlic
description: Garlic (ثوم) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Lentil
description: Lentil (عدس) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Onion
description: Onion (بصل) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Judaism
description: Judaism (اليهود) is one of the major religions mentioned in the Quran.

name: Christianity
description: Christianity (النصارى) is one of the major Religions mentioned in the Quran.

name: Sabians
description: Sabians (الصابئين) are one of the Religious groups mentioned in the Quran.

name: Sabbath
description: Sabbath (السبت) is a day of the week that was specified in previous revelations before the Quran.

name: Ape
description: Ape (قرد) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Cow
description: Cow (بقرة) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Color
description: Color (لَون) is a category that refers to the the different colors that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Jesus
description: Jesus (عيسى) is the son of Mary and a noble prophet and messenger in Islam.

name: Maryam
description: Maryam (مريم) is the mother of Jesus and son of Imran, and is one of the most highly regarded women in Islam.

name: Jibreel
description: Jibreel (جبريل) is the angel of revelation (also known as Gabriel) who recited the Quran to the prophet Muhammad.

name: Mikaeel
description: Mikaeel (ميكائيل) is the name of an angel mentioned in the Quran (also known as Michael).

name: Solomon
description: Solomon (سليمان) is a noble prophet in Islam who is known as Sulayman in the Quran, and is the son of David.

name: Babylon
description: Babylon (بابل) is mentioned in the Quran. An ancient city in Mesopotamia (c. 3000 BC), Babylon is widely considered to be the cradle of civilization.

name: Harut
description: Harut (هاروت) is the name of an angel mentioned in the Quran, who together with Marut went down to the ancient city of Babylon.

name: Marut
description: Marut (ماروت) is the name of an angel mentioned in the Quran, who together with Harut went down to the ancient city of Babylon.

name: Ibrahim
description: Ibrahim (إبراهيم) is a noble prophet in Islam (also known as Abraham), the son of Azar and the father of Ishmael and Isaac.

name: Kaaba
description: Kaaba (الكعبة) is located in the main mosque in Makkah, Masjid al-haram. Literally "the cube", the kaaba is the current Qiblah - the direction of prayer in Islam.

name: Ishmael
description: Ishmael (إسماعيل) is a noble prophet and messenger in Islam and the first born son of Ibrahim.

name: Islam
description: Islam (الإسلام) is the monotheistic religion based on the Quran and the teachings of the prophet Muhammad.

name: Yaqub
description: Yaqub (يعقوب) is a noble prophet in Islam, the son of Isaac and father of Yusuf (Joseph).

name: Isaac
description: Isaac (إسحاق) is a noble prophet in Islam, the second son of Ibrahim and the father of Yaqub (Jacob).

name: Qiblah
description: Qiblah (قبلة) is the direction of prayer in Islam.

name: Heel
description: Heel (كَعب) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Masjid al-Haram
description: Masjid al-Haram (المسجد الحرام) is the main mosque in Makkah. Surrounding the Kaaba, it is the largest Mosque in the world and the holiest place in Islam.

name: Al-Safa
description: Al-Safa (الصفا) is a small mountain outside Makkah which together with Al-marwah is visited during the Hajj pilgrimage.

name: Al-Marwah
description: Al-Marwah (المروة) is a small mountain outside Makkah which together with Al-safa is visited during the Hajj pilgrimage.

name: Hajj
description: Hajj (حج) is the pilgrimage to Makkah and one of the five pillars of Islam. The pilgrimage occurs during the 12th month of the Islamic calendar.

name: Umra
description: Umra (عمرة) is a pilgrimage to Makkah that may be performed at any time of the year.

name: Ship
description: Ship (سفينة) is one of the man-made Artifacts mentioned in the Quran.

name: Carrion
description: Carrion (الميتة) is one of the prohibited Foods mentioned in the Quran (the remains of dead animals).

name: Pork
description: Pork (لَحم الخنزير) is one of the prohibited Foods mentioned in the Quran (the flesh of Swine).

name: Ramadan
description: Ramadan (رمضان) is the sacred month of fasting in the Islamic calendar, and the month in which the Night of decree occurs.

name: Quran
description: Quran (القرآن) is the central religious text of Islam, written in Quranic Arabic.

name: Dawn
description: Dawn (فجر) is mentioned in several verses of Quran, usually in the context of worshipping Allah.

name: Mosque
description: Mosque (مسجد) is a category that refers to mosques mentioned in the Quran.

name: Moon
description: Moon (القمر) is one of the Astronomical objects mentioned in the Quran, usually referred to along with the Sun.

name: Mount Arafat
description: Mount Arafat (عرفات) is small mountain outside Makkah which is visited during the Hajj pilgrimage.

name: Hell
description: Hell (جهنم) is the place of punishment and torment in the afterlife.

name: King
description: King (ملك) is a category that refers to kings who are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Talut
description: Talut (طالوت) is the name of one of the Kings of the Israelites (also known as Saul) who is mentioned in the Quran.

name: Ark of the Covenant
description: Ark of the Covenant (تابوت العهد) is mentioned in the Quran to contain artifacts from the household of Musa (Moses) and Harun (Aaron).

name: Harun
description: Harun (هارون) is a noble prophet in Islam the younger brother of Musa.

name: Jalut
description: Jalut (جالوت) is also known as Goliath, and is mentioned in the Quran as being the leader of an army. He was killed by the prophet David (Dawood).

name: David
description: David (داود) is a noble prophet in Islam, who is known as Dawood in the Quran, and is the father of Solomon.

name: Allah's Throne
description: Allah's Throne (العرش) is mentioned in several verses of the Quran, and is also known as al-kursi.

name: Sun
description: Sun (الشمس) is one of the Astronomical objects mentioned in the Quran, usually referred to along with the Moon.

name: Bone
description: Bone (عظم) is mentioned in the Quran most often in reference to Man being resurrected after becoming dust and bones.

name: Bird
description: Bird (طائر) is one of the creations of Allah mentioned by name in the Quran. This category in the ontology includes the general concept of birds, as well as specific types of bird mentioned in the Quran.

name: Grain
description: Grain (حبة) is one of the Foods mentioned the Quran.

name: Date Palm
description: Date Palm (نخلة) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Grape
description: Grape (عنب) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Torah
description: Torah (التوراة) is the name of the holy book of law given by God to Musa (Moses), according to Islamic belief.

name: Injeel
description: Injeel (الإنجيل) is the name of the holy book revealed by God to Jesus, according to Islamic belief.

name: Eye
description: Eye (عين) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Gold
description: Gold (ذهب) is one of the types of Metal mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Silver
description: Silver (فضة) is one of the types of Metal mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Horse
description: Horse (حصان) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Nuh
description: Nuh (نوح) is a noble prophet in Islam who is mentioned in the Quran to have lived to around 950 years in age, at the time of the great flood.

name: Imran
description: Imran (عمران) is known in the Quran as the father of Maryam (Mary).

name: Zechariah
description: Zechariah (زكريا) is a noble prophet in Islam and father of Yahya (John). Zechariah was also the guardian of Maryam (Mary).

name: Yahya
description: Yahya (يحيى) is a noble prophet in Islam (known in the Bible as John the Baptist) and is the son of Zechariah.

name: Pen
description: Pen (قلم) is mentioned in several verses of the Quran.

name: Messiah
description: Messiah (المسيح) is a name used in the Quran for Jesus.

name: Clay
description: Clay (صلصال) is the Substance that Man was originally created from, according to the Quran and Islamic belief.

name: Leprosy
description: Leprosy (الأبرص) is one of the diseases mentioned in the Quran in the context of the miracles of the noble prophet Jesus, son of Mary.

name: Tongue
description: Tongue (لسان) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Bakkah
description: Bakkah (بكة) is another name for the holy city of Makkah (Mecca).

name: Badr
description: Badr (بدر) is the name of a city in Arabia mentioned in the Quran, at which an early Islamic battle took place.

name: Muhammad
description: Muhammad (محمد) is the name of the last prophet and messenger of Allah.

name: Ayyub
description: Ayyub (أيوب) is a noble prophet and messenger in Islam (also known as Job) who is mentioned in the Quran.

name: Yunus
description: Yunus (يونس) is a noble prophet in Islam whose story with the fish is mentioned in the Quran.

name: Zabur
description: Zabur (زبور) is the name of the holy book revealed by God to David (the Book of Psalms), according to Islamic belief.

name: Arrow
description: Arrow (سهم) is mentioned in the Quran in the context of divining arrows, which are prohibited according to Islamic law.

name: Abel
description: Abel (هابيل) is the brother of Cain and son of Adam. The story of Cain and Abel is mentioned in the Quran.

name: Cain
description: Cain (قابيل) is the brother of Abel and son of Adam. The story of Cain and Abel is mentioned in the Quran.

name: Crow
description: Crow (غراب) is one of the types of Bird mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Al-Jahiliyah
description: Al-Jahiliyah (الجاهلية) is the pre-Islamic time of ignorance.

name: Pig
description: Pig (خنزير) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Wine
description: Wine (خمر) is one of the prohibited Foods mentioned in the Quran, along with other intoxicants.

name: Ladder
description: Ladder (سلم) is mentioned in the Quran, and is also translated into English as "stairway".

name: Wing
description: Wing (جناح) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Key
description: Key (مفتاح) is mentioned in several verses of the Quran.

name: Leaf
description: Leaf (ورقة) is one of the parts of Plants mentioned in the Quran.

name: Azar
description: Azar (آزر) is mentioned in the Quran as the father of Ibrahim (Abraham).

name: Idol
description: Idol (الأصنام) is a category which refers to idols and other false objects of worship, that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Star
description: Star (نجم) is one of the Astronomical objects mentioned in the Quran.

name: Yusuf
description: Yusuf (يوسف) is a noble prophet in Islam and one of the sons of the prophet Yaqub (Jacob).

name: Elijah
description: Elijah (إلياس) is a noble prophet in Islam whose name is mentioned in the Quran.

name: Elisha
description: Elisha (اليسع) is a noble prophet in Islam whose name is mentioned in the Quran.

name: Lut
description: Lut (لوط) is a noble prophet in Islam who was sent by God to warn his people to turn away from evil acts.

name: Green
description: Green (أخضر) is one of the Colors mentioned in the Quran.

name: Olive
description: Olive (زيتون) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Pomegranate
description: Pomegranate (رمان) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Jinn
description: Jinn (الجن) is a category in the ontology which refers to the creations of Allah mentioned in the Quran known as the jinn.

name: Sheep
description: Sheep (غنم) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Goat
description: Goat (ماعز) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Camel
description: Camel (جمل) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Intestine
description: Intestine (أمعاء) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Children of Adam
description: Children of Adam (بنى آدم) is an alternative name mentioned in the Quran that refers to Humanity, the descendents of Adam.

name: Noah's Ark
description: Noah's Ark (سفينة نوح) is mentioned in the Quran as a sign of Allah.

name: Aad
description: Aad (عاد) are a historic people mentioned in the Quran who were sent the prophet Hud.

name: Hud
description: Hud (هود) is a noble prophet in Islam (also known as Eber) who was sent to the people of Aad.

name: Thamud
description: Thamud (ثمود) is the name of a people mentioned in the Quran who carved stone houses out of mountains in ancient Arabia. They were sent the prophet Salih.

name: Salih
description: Salih (صالح) is a noble prophet in Islam who was sent to the people of Thamud.

name: Madyan
description: Madyan (مدين) is the name of a people mentioned in the Quran who were sent the prophet Shuayb.

name: Shuayb
description: Shuayb (شعيب) is a noble prophet in Islam who is considered by many to be synonymous with the Biblical figure of Jethro.

name: Snake
description: Snake (حية) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Locust
description: Locust (جرادة) is one of the Insects mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Louse
description: Louse (القمل) is one of the Insects mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Frog
description: Frog (ضفدع) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Fish
description: Fish (حوت) are one of the creations of Allah mentioned in the Quran.

name: Dog
description: Dog (كلب) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Hunayn
description: Hunayn (حنين) is the name of a city in Arabia mentioned in the Quran, at which an early Islamic battle took place.

name: Uzair
description: Uzair (عزير) is the name of a historic person mentioned in the Quran (also known as Ezra), who according to Islamic belief used to be falsely called "the son of God".

name: Forehead
description: Forehead (جبهة) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Garden of Eden
description: Garden of Eden (جنات عدن) is the name of a place of everlasting bliss in afterlife.

name: Bedouin
description: Bedouin (أعراب) are mentioned several times in the Quran.

name: Ansar
description: Ansar (أنصار) are mentioned in the Quran, and were the citizens of Medinah that helped the prophet Muhammad during the migration from Makkah (literally, "the helpers").

name: Medinah
description: Medinah (المدينة المنورة) is a holy city in Islam (also known as Yathrib) and is located in the Hijaz region of Arabia.

name: Boat
description: Boat (سفينة) is one of the man-made Artifacts mentioned in the Quran.

name: Egypt
description: Egypt (مصر) is a land mentioned in the Quran that refers to what is known today as Ancient Egypt.

name: Al-Judi
description: Al-Judi (الجودي) is the mountain on which Noah's ark came to rest after the great flood.

name: Forelock
description: Forelock (ناصية) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Arabic
description: Arabic (العربية) is mentioned by Allah to be the Language in which the Quran was revealed, and is the language of the Arabs.

name: Wolf
description: Wolf (ذئب) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Coin
description: Coin (دَراهِم) is one of the man-made Artifacts mentioned in the Quran.

name: Knife
description: Knife (سكينة) is mentioned in the Quran in the story of the noble prophet Yusuf (Joseph).

name: Bread
description: Bread (خبز) is one of the Foods mentioned the Quran.

name: Dust
description: Dust (تراب) is one of the Physical substances mentioned in the Quran.

name: Iron
description: Iron (حديد) is one of the types of Metal mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Language
description: Language (لغة) is a category that refers to the languages mentioned in the Quran.

name: Constellation
description: Constellation (البروج) is one of the Astronomical objects mentioned in the Quran, although the Arabic term is also translated into English as "great stars".

name: Companions of the Wood
description: Companions of the Wood (أصحاب الأيكة) is a name used in the Quran to refer to a group of people from the nation of Shuayb.

name: People of al-Hijr
description: People of al-Hijr (أصحاب الحجر) are a group of people who are mentioned in the Quran, as an alternative name for the people of Thamud.

name: Mule
description: Mule (بغل) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Milk
description: Milk (لبن) is one of the Foods mentioned the Quran as a sign of creation.

name: Bee
description: Bee (نحلة) is one of the Insects mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Honey
description: Honey (عسل) is one of the Foods mentioned the Quran as a sign of creation.

name: Masjid al-Aqsa
description: Masjid al-Aqsa (المسجد الأقصى) is a sacred mosque in Jerusalem, considered to be the third holiest place in Islam.

name: Soil
description: Soil (ثرى) is one of the Physical substances mentioned in the Quran.

name: Companions of the Cave
description: Companions of the Cave (أصحاب الكهف) are a group of people whose story is recounted in the chapter of the Quran named "The Cave".

name: Brass
description: Brass (مهل) is one of the types of Metal mentioned in the Quran, although the Arabic term used is also translated into English as "copper" or "oil".

name: Silk
description: Silk (حرير) is one of the precious Materials mentioned in the Quran.

name: Dhul Qarnayn
description: Dhul Qarnayn (ذو القرنين) is righteous ruler mentioned in the Quran who constructed a wall to hold Gog and magog. His story is recounted in the chapter of the Quran named "The Cave".

name: Gog and Magog
description: Gog and Magog (يأجوج ومأجوج) are a group of people mentioned in the Quran who are kept behind a great wall.

name: Firdous
description: Firdous (الفردوس) is one of the names of Paradise mentioned in the Quran.

name: Ink
description: Ink (حبر) is mentioned in the Quran.

name: Idris
description: Idris (إدريس) is a noble prophet in Islam (also known as Enoch) whose name is mentioned in the Quran.

name: Samiri
description: Samiri (السامرى) is mentioned in the Quran as the one who turned against Musa (Moses) and misled people to worship the Golden calf.

name: Alaq
description: Alaq (علق) is usually translated into English as a clinging substance or clot, and refers to an early stage in the development of the Embryo in the womb.

name: Magians
description: Magians (المجوس) are one of the Religious groups mentioned in the Quran.

name: Pearl
description: Pearl (لؤلؤ) is one of the precious Materials mentioned in the Quran.

name: Monastery
description: Monastery (صوامع) is one of the Places of worhsip mentioned in the Quran.

name: Church
description: Church (كنيسة) is one of the Places of worhsip mentioned in the Quran.

name: Synagogue
description: Synagogue (صلوات) is one of the Places of worhsip mentioned in the Quran.

name: Fly
description: Fly (ذباب) is one of the Insects mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Mount Sinai
description: Mount Sinai (طور سيناء) is the name of a mountain mentioned in the Quran which is on the Sinai peninsula in Egypt.

name: Oil
description: Oil (زيت) is one of the Physical substances mentioned in the Quran.

name: Lip
description: Lip (شفة) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Lamp
description: Lamp (لمبة) is mentioned in several verses of the Quran.

name: Glass
description: Glass (زجاج) is one of the Materials mentioned in the Quran.

name: Salt
description: Salt (ملح) is mentioned in the Quran as one of the signs of creation, in the context of the division of the seas into freshwater and saltwater.

name: Ant
description: Ant (نمل) is one of the Insects mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Hoopoe
description: Hoopoe (هدهد) is one of the types of Bird mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Sheba
description: Sheba (سبأ) is an ancient land mentioned in the Quran that was ruled over by Balqis, the Queen of Sheba.

name: Beast of the Earth
description: Beast of the Earth (دابة الارض) is mentioned in Quran. The nature of the beast is further explained in the hadith of the prophet Muhammad.

name: Haman
description: Haman (هامان) is the name of the chief minister of the Pharaoh at the time of Musa (Moses).

name: Qarun
description: Qarun (قارون) is the name of an Israelite mentioned in the Quran who turned against Musa (Moses).

name: Spider
description: Spider (عنكبوت) is one of the Insects mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Romans
description: Romans (الروم) are an ancient people who are mentioned in Quran, in verse (30:2). A chapter of the Quran is also named after the Romans.

name: Luqman
description: Luqman (لقمان) is the name of righteous and wise man mentioned in the Quran.

name: Azrael
description: Azrael (عزرائيل) is the name of the Angel of death, according to general Islamic belief, although the name Azrael is not mentioned explicitly in the Quran.

name: Yathrib
description: Yathrib (يثرب) is another name for the holy city of Medinah.

name: Desert
description: Desert (صحراء) is one of the Geographical locations mentioned the Quran.

name: Zayd
description: Zayd (زيد) is mentioned by name in the Quran and was the adopted son of the prophet Muhammad.

name: Coat of Mail
description: Coat of Mail (سابغات) is mentioned in the Quran as having been constructed by the prophet Dawood (David) from Iron, to use as armour.

name: Lote Tree
description: Lote Tree (السدرة) is a Location in the afterlife that is mentioned in the Quran, and is usually considered to be part of Paradise.

name: Zaqqum
description: Zaqqum (زقوم) is the name of a Tree, that according to Islamic belief grows in Jahannam (Hell).

name: Baal
description: Baal (بعل) is the name of a false deity mentioned in the Quran.

name: Dhul Kifl
description: Dhul Kifl (ذو الكفل) is a righteous man who some Muslims also consider to be a noble prophet, altough this is not mentioned explictly in the Quran.

name: Horizon
description: Horizon (أفق) is one of the Geographical locations mentioned the Quran.

name: Malik
description: Malik (مالك) is the name of an angel mentioned in the Quran.

name: Tubba
description: Tubba (تبع) are an ancient people who are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Al-Ahqaf
description: Al-Ahqaf (الأحقاف) is a historic region mentioned in the Quran that refers to the curved sand dunes in the southern part of the Arabian peninsula.

name: Makkah
description: Makkah (مكة) is the holiest city in Islam (also known as Mecca) and is located in the Hijaz region of Arabia.

name: Companions of the Rass
description: Companions of the Rass (أصحاب الرس) are a group of people who are mentioned in the Quran (also known as the companions of the well).

name: Meat
description: Meat (لحم) is one of the Foods mentioned the Quran.

name: Allat
description: Allat (اللات) is the name of a false pre-Islamic goddess mentioned in the Quran.

name: Al-Uzza
description: Al-Uzza (العزى) is the name of a false pre-Islamic goddess mentioned in the Quran.

name: Manat
description: Manat (مناة) is the name of a false pre-Islamic goddess mentioned in the Quran.

name: Embryo
description: Embryo (أجنة) is one of the stages of Human development mentioned in the Quran, although the Arabic term used is also translated into English as "fetus".

name: Sirius
description: Sirius (الشِّعرى) is one of the Astronomical objects mentioned in the Quran.

name: Saqar
description: Saqar (سقر) is one of the names of Hell (Jahannam) mentioned in the Quran.

name: Coral
description: Coral (مرجان) is one of the precious Materials mentioned in the Quran.

name: Ruby
description: Ruby (ياقوت) is one of the precious Minerals mentioned in the Quran.

name: Ahmad
description: Ahmad (أحمد) is one of the names of the noble prophet and messenger Muhammad.

name: Friday
description: Friday (الجمعة) is the day of the week in which the Jumu'ah prayer is performed (the Friday prayer).

name: Snout
description: Snout (خرطوم) is one of the Parts of the body mentioned in the Quran.

name: Ladha
description: Ladha (لظى) is one of the names of Hell (Jahannam) mentioned in the Quran.

name: Wadd
description: Wadd (واد) is the name of a false deity mentioned in the Quran, who was worshipped at the time of the prophet Nuh (Noah).

name: Suwa
description: Suwa (سواع) is the name of a false deity mentioned in the Quran, who was worshipped at the time of the prophet Nuh (Noah).

name: Yaghuth
description: Yaghuth (يغوث) is the name of a false deity mentioned in the Quran, who was worshipped at the time of the prophet Nuh (Noah).

name: Yauq
description: Yauq (يعوق) is the name of a false deity mentioned in the Quran, who was worshipped at the time of the prophet Nuh (Noah).

name: Nasr
description: Nasr (نسر) is the name of a false deity mentioned in the Quran, who was worshipped at the time of the prophet Nuh (Noah).

name: Lion
description: Lion (أسد) is one of the Animals mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Ginger
description: Ginger (زنجبيل) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Salsabil
description: Salsabil (سلسبيل) is the name of a fountain or spring, that the Quran mentions as being located in Paradise.

name: Sijjeen
description: Sijjeen (سجين) is a name used to refer to both a record of evil deeds, as well as part of Jahannam (Hell).

name: Companions of the Pit
description: Companions of the Pit (أصحاب الأخدود) are a group of people who are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Breast Bone
description: Breast Bone (الترائب) is mentioned in the Quran, although in the verse that the Arabic word occurs, this term is also often translated into English as "ribs".

name: Iram
description: Iram (إرم) is the name of a place in ancient Arabia mentioned in the Quran (also known as Iram of the Pillars).

name: Fig
description: Fig (تين) is one of the types of Plant mentioned in the Quran.

name: Night of Decree
description: Night of Decree (ليلة القدر) is the night in the month of Ramadan in which the Quran was revealed to the prophet Muhammad (also known as the Night of Power).

name: Companions of the Elephant
description: Companions of the Elephant (أصحاب الفيل) are a group of people whose story is recounted in the chapter of the Quran named "The Elephant".

name: Quraysh
description: Quraysh (قريش) is the name of the tribe to which the prophet Muhammad belonged.

name: Abu Lahab
description: Abu Lahab (أَبو لهب) is mentioned by name in the Quran as a condemned enemy of Islam.

name: Umm Jamil
description: Umm Jamil (أم جميل) is the wife of Abu lahab, and is referred to in the Quran as an enemy of Islam.

name: Artifact
description: Artifact is a category that refers to man-made constructions that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Place of Worship
description: Place of Worship is a category that refers to places of worship that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Weaponary
description: Weaponary is a category that refers to weaponary mentioned in the Quran, although these instruments may also have other uses.

name: Astronomical Body
description: Astronomical Body is a category that refers to astronomical objects that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Event
description: Event is a category that refers to temporal events.

name: Afterlife Event
description: Afterlife Event is a category that refers to events in the afterlife.

name: Calendar Event
description: Calendar Event is a category in the ontology which refers to recurring Events in the Islamic calendar, or to other religious calendar events mentioned in the Quran.

name: Historic Event
description: Historic Event is a category that refers to historic events mentioned in the Quran.

name: Physical Event
description: Physical Event is a category that refers to temporal events mentioned in the Quran, that naturally occur in the physical world.

name: False Deity
description: False Deity is a category related to the worhsip of false gods mentioned in the Quran.

name: Holy Book
description: Holy Book is a category that refers to holy books and other religious texts that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Living Creation
description: Living Creation is a category that refers to the living creations of Allah that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Organic Object
description: Organic Object is a category that refers to organic objects and other biological entities.

name: Biological Organism
description: Biological Organism is a category that refers to biological organisms that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Animal
description: Animal is a category which refers to animals mentioned in the Quran.

name: Insect
description: Insect is a category that refers to insects that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Plant
description: Plant is a category that refers to plants that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Body Part
description: Body Part is a category that refers to the parts of livings things that are mentioned Quran.

name: Disease
description: Disease is a category that refers to diseases mentioned in the Quran.

name: Food
description: Food is a category that refers to foods mentioned in the Quran, and includes both lawful foods as well as foods that are prohibited according to Islamic law.

name: Sentient Creation
description: Sentient Creation is a category which refers to the Angels, Jinn, Humanity and other sentient creations mentioned in the Quran.

name: Angel
description: Angel (الملائكة) is a category in the ontology which refers to the creations of Allah mentioned in the Quran known as angels. According to Islamic belief, the angels were created from light in an analogous way to how the Jinn were created from fire, and Man from Clay.

name: Human
description: Human is a category in the ontology which refers to individual human beings or groups of people mentioned in the Quran.

name: Historic People
description: Historic People is a category that refers to ancient nations, tribes and other groups of historic people mentioned in the Quran.

name: Historic Person
description: Historic Person is a category in the ontology which refers to individual historic people mentioned by name in the Quran, or who are well-known in Islam.

name: Messenger
description: Messenger is a category that refers to the messengers of Allah mentioned in the Quran.

name: Prophet
description: Prophet is a category that refers to the prophets of Allah mentioned in the Quran.

name: Location
description: Location is a category that refers to places and other locations that are mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Afterlife Location
description: Afterlife Location is a category that refers to locations in the afterlife.

name: Geographical Location
description: Geographical Location is a category that refers to geographical locations mentioned in the Quran.

name: City
description: City is a category that refers to cities mentioned in the Quran.

name: Historic Land
description: Historic Land is a category that refers to ancient lands and other historic locations mentioned in the Quran.

name: Mountain
description: Mountain is a category that refers to the mountains and other small mounts that are mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Physical Attribute
description: Physical Attribute is a category that refers to the attributes of physical objects.

name: Physical Substance
description: Physical Substance is a category that refers to physical substances mentioned in the Quran.

name: Metal
description: Metal is a category that refers to the types of metal that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Mineral
description: Mineral is a category that refers to the different minerals that are mentioned in the Quran.

name: Religion
description: Religion is a category that refers to the major relgions, or other systems of ancient belief, that are mentioned by name in the Quran.

name: Weather Phenomena
description: Weather Phenomena is a category that refers to the different types of weather phenomena that are mentioned in the Quran.

Doctraine
description: ۩ Doctrine (e.g acts of worship, human interactions, family relations, and business transactions), which focuses mainly on a Muslim’s relationship with Allah, other people, and the rest of Allah’s creation.

name: Stories
description: ⌛ Stories(e.g., the story of Moses, Noah, and Ṣâliḥ), which served two purposes: to reassure the Prophet’s heart, as he was met with rejection in Mecca, and as cautionary tales for the pagans (see 11:120-123). Other stories (e.g., Joseph and Job) focus on moral lessons.

name: The Unseen
description: ☼ The Unseen (e.g the belief in Allah and His qualities, as well as angels, resurrection, judgment, etc.), which reaffirms one’s faith in the divine through one’s heart, not eyes.
